context.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use Action-based vocabulary, alongside types such as Comment.
context.rdfs:label: UserComments

properties.rdfs:comment: Specifies the CreativeWork associated with the UserComment.
properties.rdfs:label: discusses

properties.rdfs:comment: The time at which the UserComment was made.
properties.rdfs:label: commentTime

properties.rdfs:comment: The URL at which a reply may be posted to the specified UserComment.
properties.rdfs:label: replyToUrl
